alert.note: Alert for Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Texas County through 745 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northeast of Hartville to 16 miles north of Cabool to 9 miles west of Houston to near Mountain Grove. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Licking, Houston, Raymondville, Huggins, Bucyrus, Hazelton, Success, Yukon, Roby, Solo, Simmons, Prescott and Bendavis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
